## BrowserHashingNormalizer class

Browser-compatible hashing normalizer using Web Crypto API.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class BrowserHashingNormalizer extends Hash.HashingNormalizer 
```
**Extends:** Hash.HashingNormalizer
